Name: Pre Siesta
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Orange liqueurs and bitters flavour this tequila-based, salmon-pink bittersweet cocktail that is perhaps better-served on-the-rocks.
History: Created in 2007 by Rich Hunt at Mahiki in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pre Siesta contains 180 calories
